rating_comment: Great stay, really needed some extra accomodation and Ashrafuls place was the perfect find.

Thanks Ashraful Bhai for organising such a pleasant stay for my family. Will be staying again when coming back.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
It's a nice place to stay with family. I highly recommend it for those who want a peaceful surrounding. Mr.Ashraf is very friendly; he even responded while he was outside of Bangladesh. Flexible check-in which allow families who are travelling from other district.
Riaz, the caretaker is also very polite and supportive.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It was our second visit, definitely one of the best property in Dhaka and the peoples are working here namely Mr. Riajul, is awesome guy and very professional. Our all family members wants to visit here again without any doubt.

info: Rating, 1 star,  · March 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: completely unprofessional. his house was full of smoking smell but he scholded me for smoking. while i went outside after 3 hr of check in he entered the property without my permission and took some images and started scholding and thretning saying his security system was activated and he has inside property footage of me means he has hidden cam. when i asked what suspicious activity he found from me then he could not answer back. finally he did not allow me after 3 hr of checking in while i went outside for some work

Mr Ashraful and his team were always very supportive. They always acted immediately if I had any issue. The only thing that bothered me was the mosquitoes but when you stay in dhaka it’s a problem for all areas more or less. And again the property has window nets and all feasible technologies to overcome this mosquito problem.
